title: HTML Introduction
description: Create a basic HTML document with a title, a paragraph, and a list.

examples.output: Displays a web page with 'Hello, World!' in a paragraph.

constraints: Use at least one heading and one list.
starterCode:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
  <title><!-- your title here --></title>
</head>
<body>
  <!-- your code here -->
</body>
</html>
hints: Start with <!DOCTYPE html> to define the document type.

Use

for headings,

for paragraphs, and

    /
  • for lists.
